Name: Escape From School
About the game: You find yourself stuck in a school classroom, you and your friends try to escape by solving puzzles and finding the correct answers. To escape the classroom, you will have to inspect, interact, combine, and interpret objects to obtain clues to solve new puzzles. puzzles hint System reset Items Single-player and Multiplayer co-op for 2-4 players FAQ How long is the game? Like any escape room, it is intended to be played once. The average time of completion is around 50 minutes.
